author: alice
title: Add required vat_code to /v1/payments/create
body: Breaking change: /v1/payments/create now requires vat_code for EU customers. Downstream services must update their integrations and doc owners should refresh guides.
text_for_embedding: PR #2041: Add required vat_code to /v1/payments/create. Breaking change requiring vat_code for EU customers.

author: bob
title: Fix 400 errors by adding vat_code to payments API calls
body: We are seeing 400s from core-api after vat_code became mandatory. This PR threads vat_code through checkout and notes that docs still need a deeper refresh.
text_for_embedding: PR #118: Fix 400 errors by adding vat_code to payments API calls. Adds vat_code payloads for EU carts but onboarding doc is still incomplete.
